name: Home
text:
This is a community wiki dedicated to [http://jruby.org JRuby], an implementation of the [http://www.ruby-lang.org/en Ruby] programming language atop the Java Virtual Machine.
* [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby JRuby Downloads] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/1.3.0/jruby-bin-1.3.0.tar.gz JRuby 1.3.0 Binary .tar.gz] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/1.3.0/jruby-bin-1.3.0.zip JRuby 1.3.0 Binary .zip] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/1.3.0/jruby-src-1.3.0.tar.gz JRuby 1.3.0 Source .tar.gz] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/1.3.0/jruby-src-1.3.0.zip JRuby 1.3.0 Source .zip]
==JRuby Basics== * [[About JRuby]] * [[Getting Started]] * [[Walkthroughs and Tutorials]] * [[ApplicationsAndLibraries|Help with libraries/applications]] * [[Java Integration | Embedding JRuby]] * [[CallingJavaFromJRuby|Scripting Java from JRuby]] * [[Performance Tuning]] * [[FAQs]] ==[[JRuby on Rails]]== * [http://blog.emptyway.com/2008/04/08/120-seconds-guide-to-jruby-on-rails| 120 seconds guide to JRuby on Rails] * [[ActiveRecord-JDBC]] * [[JRuby on Rails#Deployment|Deploying Rails Apps]] ([[Warbler]]) * [[JRuby on Rails|More...]]
==Getting Involved== * Communicate: [[Mailing Lists]], [[IRC]], [http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JRUBY JIRA (bugs)] * Code: [http://kenai.com/projects/jruby/sources/main/show Main Repository], [http://github.com/jruby/jruby/tree/master GitHub mirror] * Status: [http://jruby.headius.com:8080/hudson/ build server] * [[JRuby Bug Reporting Style Guide]] * [[JRuby Style Guide]] * [http://blog.emptyway.com/2008/03/27/how-to-contribute-to-jruby-effectively How to contribute to JRuby effectively] * [[JRuby and RubySpecs]] * [[Ruby 1_9 Support|Ruby 1.9 Support]] - Remaining work to be done and how to contribute * [[Release Documentation]] * [[RoadMap]] ==Hints, Tips and Documents== * [[JRuby Cookbook]] * [[Using the JRuby Debugger]] * [[Differences between mri and jruby]] * [[JRuby Internal Design]]
==Specifications== * [[Compiler Packaging and Pathing]] * [[Compiler Name Mangling]] * [[JIT Compiler]] * [[Static Compiler]] * [[Classpath and Load Path]] * [[Require and Load behavior]] * [[Ruby_JRuby Security|Ruby/JRuby Security]] A New Security Implementation to Replace SAFE/TAINT) * [[JRubyMethod_Signatures|JRuby Method Binding]] - How to wire up Java methods in a JRuby extension == Evangelism == * [[Benchmarking Tips and Tricks]] * [[JRubyPresentations | JRuby Talks and Presentations * [[Success Stories]] * [[Case_Study_JRuby on Eclipse RCP|Case Study: JRuby on Eclipse RCP]]
==Related Websites== * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JRuby JRuby's article on Wikipedia] * [http://www.infoq.com/news/2008/05/csi-disease-management-jruby Real world JRuby on Rails: Infectious disease reporting and management] * Try [http://kessel.ilrt.bris.ac.uk/~pldms/2006/12/jruby-applet.html running the JRuby interactive shell as an applet in your browser!] * [http://www.tbray.org/ongoing/When/200x/2006/08/17/JRuby Why JRuby?][http://www.usome.com] (Tim Bray) * [http://rubyforge.org/projects/jruby-extras jruby-extras] (Support for Libraries and Applications not included in standard JRuby) * [http://www.ociweb.com/jnb/jnbApr2007.html Introduction to JRuby] * [http://wiki.glassfish.java.net/Wiki.jsp?page=JRuby GlassFish JRuby Wiki] * [http://blogs.sun.com/theaquarium/tags/jruby GlassFish Aquarium JRuby posts] * [http://pipes.yahoo.com/pipes/pipe.info?_id=oCCxOv9w3BGq_aM_1vC6Jw Fresh JRuby news Yahoo Pipes aggregator] * [http://www.jrubyhub.com JRubyHub.com: The hub for all resources related to JRuby and JRuby on Rails resources] * [http://wiki.oracle.com/page/JRuby+on+Rails%3A+Oracle+SSO+Integration Integrating Oracle SSO with a JRuby on Rails app] * [http://atalks.prokhorenko.us/2009/02/ruby-on-rails-application-migrating.html Migrating Ruby on Rails 2.2.2 (and MySQL) web app to JRuby running on Tomcat] * [http://jeanderuelle.blogspot.com/2009/03/my-jruby-rails-app-on-jboss-can-make.html My JRuby-Rails app on JBoss and Mobicents can make Phone calls !] * [http://code.trampolinesystems.com/springy Springy: configure Spring contexts with JRuby] * [http://www.trampolinesystems.com/weblog/wiring-up-spring-with-jruby/ Trampoline Systems Weblog -- Wiring up Spring with JRuby]
